sentences.sContent: Yeah, , now you know how the sex ratio matters!
sentences.sContent_eng: Yeah, , now you know how the sex ratio matters!
sentences.sCn: 是的，现在你知道性别比例的问题了吧！ ！

sentences.sContent: The ratio could reach one in four within a year.
sentences.sContent_eng: The ratio could reach one in four within a year.
sentences.sCn: 一年之内这个比例可以达到四分之一。

sentences.sContent: When using profiling it is typical to consider only the ratio (or percentage) of time spent in certain areas.
sentences.sContent_eng: When using profiling it is typical to consider only the ratio (or percentage) of time spent in certain areas.
sentences.sCn: 当使用分析时，它是典型的考虑时间花费在某些领域的比例（或百分比）。

phrases.pCn: n. 摩尔比率，摩尔浓度；克分子比，克分子比率
阻尼系数；阻尼比率；衰减率
传动比；总齿轮比；传输比

remMethod.val: rat(计算) + io → 和计算有关的 → 比例

words.tran: 按比例的；可估价的；应纳税的（等于ratable）

trans.tranOther: a relationship between two amounts, represented by a pair of numbers showing how much bigger one amount is than the other
